---
title: "Customize model inventory layout"
date: last-modified
---

Configure the information that displays on the model inventory, and swap between inventory views. 

:::{.callout}
Changes are automatically saved to your account and do not affect other users.
:::

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] There are models registered in the model inventory.[^1]

:::

## Steps

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

2. Click **{{< fa table >}} Manage Columns** to manage column visibility and order. To use this feature, make sure you're in table view.[^2]

   You can toggle visibility for each item and drag each option to change the order:

   ![Manage Columns in the model inventory](manage-columns-demo.gif){width=80% fig-alt="An animation that shows how to manage columns in the model inventory"}

- Available columns are determined by your model inventory fields.[^3] 
- For example, to add model stage to your table view, toggle [stage]{.smallcaps}.[^4]

#### Inventory display views

- To display the inventory in table view, click **{{< fa table >}} Display Table**. 
- To display the inventory in card view, click **Display Cards**.
